that there is no Folk Espresso this morning....mainly because there appears to be no electricity at the station.  I showed up at 5:15 with a sackful of great music, but alas, the place was a ghost-town.  The night's wind and rain must've done quite a number on some electrical box somewhere!  Well, be sure to tune in tomorrow morning for Early Morning Gumbo with Diane Karl--she always does
